languages.text: "Да что рассказать, мы ж не высоколобые, а простые работяги. Штука это древняя, не очень нам понятная, довольно опасная. До нас ее техножрецы потрошили... то есть это... ну, ритуалы свои проводили, духам кланялись. После них, конечно, мало ценного остается, но до них лезть боязно. Опять же, мы дюжину поломанных сервиторов потом из шахт подоставали, от жрецов оставшихся. Вонь от этой дохлятины конечно жуткая, зато из сервитора можно на продажу деталей наковырять".

"Not much, we're no eggheads, you know — we're manual labour. It's an ancient thing, pretty dangerous, and we don't really know much beyond that. Before we came here, some Tech-Priests had done their own bit of gutting... I mean ritualling, bowing to the spirits, all that. That lot don't tend to leave a whole lot of valuables behind, it's true, but it's way too scary to go in before them. And hey, we dragged a dozen of their broken servitors out of the mines after. The carcasses smell awful, but you can pluck a decent number of parts out of a servitor and sell them."
languages.original_text: "Да что рассказать, мы ж не высоколобые, а простые работяги. Штука это древняя, не очень нам понятная, довольно опасная. Опять же, мы дюжину поломанных сервиторов потом из шахт подоставали, от жрецов оставшихся. Вонь от этой дохлятины конечно жуткая, зато из сервитора можно на продажу деталей наковырять".

languages.text: “不太多。您也知道，我们不是书呆子，是体力劳动者。这玩意很古老，相当危险。除此之外，我们知道得也不多。我们来这里之前，已经有一群技术神甫来这里搜刮过了……我是说，已经来这里举行过仪式，对神明念叨过了。确实，但凡是那群家伙搜刮过的地方，恐怕不会剩下什么值钱的东西，但如果抢在他们之前先冲进去，那简直就是要钱不要命了。而且，他们出来之后，我们还从竖井里拖出来一大群已经坏了的机仆。那些机仆的尸体臭得要命，不过它们身上有不少不错的零件，可以卖个好价钱。”
languages.original_text: "Not much, we're no eggheads, you know — we're manual labour. It's an ancient thing, pretty dangerous, and we don't really know much beyond that. Before we came here, some Tech-Priests had done their own bit of gutting... I mean ritualling, bowing to the spirits, all that. That lot don't tend to leave a whole lot of valuables behind, it's true, but it's way too scary to go in before them. And hey, we dragged a dozen of their broken servitors out of the mines after. The carcasses smell awful, but you can pluck a decent number of parts out of a servitor and sell them."

traits.locale_text: “不太多。您也知道，我们不是书呆子，是体力劳动者。这玩意很古老，相当危险。除此之外，我们知道得也不多。我们来这里之前，已经有一群技术祭司来这里搜刮过了……我是说，已经来这里举行过仪式，对神明念叨过了。确实，但凡是那群家伙搜刮过的地方，恐怕不会剩下什么值钱的东西，但如果抢在他们之前先冲进去，那简直就是要钱不要命了。而且，他们出来之后，我们还从竖井里拖出来一大群已经坏了的奴工。那些奴工的尸体臭得要命，不过它们身上有不少不错的零件，可以卖个好价钱。”
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: «No mucho. Somos mano de obra, no cerebritos. Lo que sabemos es que es muy antiguo, bastante peligroso y poco más. Antes de que llegáramos, unos tecnosacerdotes habían metido mano... quiero decir, con sus rituales, reverencias a los espíritus y todo eso. Esa gente no suele dejarse muchas piezas valiosas, no, pero a ver quién se atreve a entrar antes que ellos. Y bueno, luego sacamos una decena de servidores rotos suyos de las minas. Sus restos apestan, pero se puede sacar un buen número de piezas de un servidor para venderlas».
languages.original_text: "Not much, we're no eggheads, you know — we're manual labour. It's an ancient thing, pretty dangerous, and we don't really know much beyond that. Before we came here, some Tech-Priests had done their own bit of gutting... I mean ritualling, bowing to the spirits, all that. That lot don't tend to leave a whole lot of valuables behind, it's true, but it's way too scary to go in before them. And hey, we dragged a dozen of their broken servitors out of the mines after. The carcasses smell awful, but you can pluck a decent number of parts out of a servitor and sell them."

traits.locale_text: «No mucho. Somos mano de obra, no cerebritos. Lo que sabemos es que es muy antiguo, bastante peligroso y poco más. Antes de que llegáramos, unos tecnosacerdotes habían metido mano... quiero decir, con sus rituales, reverencias a los espíritus y todo eso. Esa gente no suele dejarse muchas piezas valiosas, no, pero a ver quién se atreve a entrar antes que ellos. Y bueno, luego sacamos una decena de servidores rotos suyos de las minas. Sus restos apestan, pero se puede sacar un buen número de piezas de un servidor para venderlas».
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: 「大したことはありません、私たちは頭がおかしいわけではありません。ご存知のとおり、私たちは肉体労働者です。これは古くからある職業で、かなり危険なものです。私たちはこれ以上のことはあまり知りません。私たちがここに来る前に、技術司祭の中には多少の労働をしていた人もいました…つまり、儀式をしたり、精霊に頭を下げたり、そういったことです。あの人たちが、大量の貴重品を残していくことはありません。本当のことです。ですが、怖すぎて、あの人達より先には入れません。あ、でも、私たちはあの人たちの壊れたサーヴィターを十数台、鉱山から引きずり出しましたよ。死骸はひどい臭いがしますが、サーヴィターからかなりの数の部品を取り出して売ることができるのです」
languages.original_text: "Not much, we're no eggheads, you know — we're manual labour. It's an ancient thing, pretty dangerous, and we don't really know much beyond that. Before we came here, some Tech-Priests had done their own bit of gutting... I mean ritualling, bowing to the spirits, all that. That lot don't tend to leave a whole lot of valuables behind, it's true, but it's way too scary to go in before them. And hey, we dragged a dozen of their broken servitors out of the mines after. The carcasses smell awful, but you can pluck a decent number of parts out of a servitor and sell them."

traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: "Nicht viel, wir sind schließlich keine Eierköpfe, sondern einfache Arbeiter. Es ist uralt, ziemlich gefährlich, und recht viel mehr wissen wir nicht. Vor unserer Ankunft hatten einige Techpriester schon mit dem Ausschlachten angefangen ... Will sagen, Rituale durchgeführt, die Geister geehrt und so. Diese Leute lassen meist nicht viel von Wert zurück, das stimmt schon, aber vor ihnen reinzugehen, ist viel zu unheimlich. Wir haben danach auch tatsächlich ein Dutzend ihrer kaputten Servitoren aus den Minen gezogen. Die Kadaver stinken furchtbar, aber man kann aus einem Servitor ordentlich Einzelteile rausholen und verkaufen."
languages.original_text: "Not much, we're no eggheads, you know — we're manual labour. It's an ancient thing, pretty dangerous, and we don't really know much beyond that. Before we came here, some Tech-Priests had done their own bit of gutting... I mean ritualling, bowing to the spirits, all that. That lot don't tend to leave a whole lot of valuables behind, it's true, but it's way too scary to go in before them. And hey, we dragged a dozen of their broken servitors out of the mines after. The carcasses smell awful, but you can pluck a decent number of parts out of a servitor and sell them."

Diese Leute lassen meist nicht viel von Wert zurück, das stimmt schon, aber vor ihnen reinzugehen, ist viel zu unheimlich. Wir haben danach auch tatsächlich ein Dutzend ihrer kaputten Servitoren aus den Minen gezogen. Die Kadaver stinken furchtbar, aber man kann aus einem Servitor ordentlich Einzelteile rausholen und verkaufen."
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: « Pas grand-chose. On n'est pas des scientifiques, vous savez... juste des ouvriers. Je peux vous dire qu'elle est ancienne et plutôt dangereuse, mais c'est à peu près tout. Avant notre arrivée, des technoprêtres avaient déjà fait leur travail de recyclage... Je veux dire, leurs rituels, leurs courbettes aux esprits, tout ça. Ils ne laissent pas beaucoup de choses de valeur derrière eux, c'est vrai, mais c'est bien trop dangereux d'y aller en premier. Et puis on a quand même sorti des mines une douzaine de leurs servitors après. Leurs carcasses sentent la mort, mais on peut en extraire un bon paquet de pièces détachées pour les revendre. »
languages.original_text: "Not much, we're no eggheads, you know — we're manual labour. It's an ancient thing, pretty dangerous, and we don't really know much beyond that. Before we came here, some Tech-Priests had done their own bit of gutting... I mean ritualling, bowing to the spirits, all that. That lot don't tend to leave a whole lot of valuables behind, it's true, but it's way too scary to go in before them. And hey, we dragged a dozen of their broken servitors out of the mines after. The carcasses smell awful, but you can pluck a decent number of parts out of a servitor and sell them."

Ils ne laissent pas beaucoup de choses de valeur derrière eux, c'est vrai, mais c'est bien trop dangereux d'y aller en premier. Et puis on a quand même sorti des mines une douzaine de leurs servitors après. Leurs carcasses sentent la mort, mais on peut en extraire un bon paquet de pièces détachées pour les revendre. »
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: "Pek anlatamam. Bizim saksılar pek çalışmıyor... Ameleyiz biz. Eski bir gemi bu, bayağı da tehlikeli. Bunun ötesini pek bilmiyoruz. Biz gelmeden önce birkaç Tekno Rahip gelip burayı soğana çevirmiş... Yani ayin yapıp ruhların gönlünü almışlar falan işte. Tekno Rahip kısmı genelde ardında pek değerli mal bırakmaz, orası doğru ama onlar girmeden dalmayı da gözümüz yemez. Olsun, zaten sonra madenlerden bozuk hizmetörlerinden on kadarını çıkardık. Cesetlerin kokusu dayanılacak gibi değil ama hizmetörlerden bol bol parça çıkarıp satılabiliyor."
languages.original_text: "Not much, we're no eggheads, you know — we're manual labour. It's an ancient thing, pretty dangerous, and we don't really know much beyond that. Before we came here, some Tech-Priests had done their own bit of gutting... I mean ritualling, bowing to the spirits, all that. That lot don't tend to leave a whole lot of valuables behind, it's true, but it's way too scary to go in before them. And hey, we dragged a dozen of their broken servitors out of the mines after. The carcasses smell awful, but you can pluck a decent number of parts out of a servitor and sell them."
